Name: Hinter
About the game: Based on True Crime The Hinterkaifeck farm Murders persisted of 6 members of the Gruber family being killed in a disturbing way with unexplainable events that follow it all throughout Built with terrifying detail for horror lovers Play as the Head of the family (Andreas Gruber) and experience the events unfold (with enhanced elements to the story) Your decisions impact the flow of the game and your experience with a focus on Good and Bad and where they lead you in life. Warning this game is not for people with heart problems, phobias of blood or people under the age of 18 Features And Mechanics: Retro 90's aesthetic NPC Dialogue Multiple Choice Situations Snowy Environment Usable Vintage Camera Bear AI Challenging Situations under pressure Hinter; a scare in the winter Early look; images are subject to change
